verses.text: \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Saba, having; \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fame|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w try|strong="H5254"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* hard \w questions|strong="H2420"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w entering|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w great|strong="H3966"\w* train, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w riches|strong="H2428"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w spices|strong="H1314"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w immense|strong="H3966"\w* quantity \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* king \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w informed|strong="H5046"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w proposed|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* ignorant \w of|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w could|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H1697"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Saba \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* meat \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* apartments \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* order \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w ministers|strong="H8334"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* apparel, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* cupbearers, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* holocausts, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w any|strong="H5750"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H1961"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w report|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w true|strong="H0571"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*,

\w Concerning|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w concerning|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w did|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w believe|strong="H0539"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* myself, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w own|strong="H5869"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* found \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H0834"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: thy \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thy works, \w exceed|strong="H3254"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* fame \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* thy \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w who|strong="H0376"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee \w always|strong="H8548"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thy \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast \w pleased|strong="H2654"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w set|strong="H7760"\w* thee \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath loved \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w appointed|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w spices|strong="H1314"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H3966"\w* store, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*: \w there|strong="H7230"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w such|strong="H0834"\w* \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w spices|strong="H1314"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w these|strong="H1931"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Saba \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*.

(\w The|strong="H0834"\w* navy \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w of|strong="H6086"\w* \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w Ophir|strong="H0211"\w*, \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w Ophir|strong="H0211"\w* \w great|strong="H3966"\w* plenty \w of|strong="H6086"\w* thyine \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* thyine \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rails \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* citterns \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w harps|strong="H3658"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w singers|strong="H7891"\w*: \w there|strong="H2088"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* thyine \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* unto \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.)

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Saba \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w desired|strong="H2656"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*: \w besides|strong="H0905"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w offered|strong="H5414"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w bounty|strong="H3027"\w*. \w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* returned, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* went \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* own \w country|strong="H0776"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* sixty-six \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*:

\w Besides|strong="H0905"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* which \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* brought \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H0376"\w* \w over|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tributes, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w merchants|strong="H7402"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* sold \w by|strong="H3605"\w* retail, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Arabia|strong="H6152"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w governors|strong="H6346"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w two|strong="H3967"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w shields|strong="H6793"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* purest \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: \w he|strong="H6213"\w* allowed \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* sides \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* plates \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w shield|strong="H6793"\w*.

\w King|strong="H4428"\w* Solomon \w also|strong="H4428"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H4428"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w ivory|strong="H8127"\w*: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H6823"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* finest \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

\w It|strong="H0310"\w* \w had|strong="H3027"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w steps|strong="H4609"\w*: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w was|strong="H4725"\w* \w round|strong="H5696"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w*: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w there|strong="H2088"\w* \w were|strong="H3027"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w either|strong="H2088"\w* \w side|strong="H2088"\w* holding \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w seat|strong="H3678"\w*: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w lions|strong="H0738"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w*, \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w each|strong="H2088"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8033"\w* \w twelve|strong="H6240"\w* little \w lions|strong="H0738"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w steps|strong="H4609"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w side|strong="H2088"\w* \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H2088"\w*: \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w was|strong="H4467"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* work \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*.

Moreover \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w which|strong="H1004"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* drank, \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w furniture|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Libanus \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w most|strong="H4428"\w* \w pure|strong="H5462"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w account|strong="H0369"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* navy, \w once|strong="H0259"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* navy \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w* \w by|strong="H0935"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* Tharsis, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* thence \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* elephants’ teeth, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w apes|strong="H6971"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w peacocks|strong="H8500"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* exceeded \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*.
